title: Binge drinking in adolescence may increase risk for anxiety later in life

title_detail.value: Binge drinking in adolescence may increase risk for anxiety later in life

summary: Researchers have found that adolescent binge drinking, even if discontinued, increases the risk for anxiety later in life due to abnormal epigenetic programming.

summary_detail.value: Researchers have found that adolescent binge drinking, even if discontinued, increases the risk for anxiety later in life due to abnormal epigenetic programming.
